attributes.action: make it compulsory for pet shops to inform potential pet owners of the type of establishment that their animals are sourced from, whether it be from a breeding farm, an accidental litter, abroad or bred by the pet shop itself.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thousands of animals are bought in pet shops each year with no consideration made as to where the animals are sourced from. If pet shops are forced to disclose this information it will allow the potential owners to make a more informed decision.
